activities.name: Robotics Team Captain
activities.description: Led 15-person robotics team to state championships

activities.name: Math Tutoring
activities.impact: Helped 20+ students improve grades by 1+ letter grade

core_values.description: Using technology to solve real-world problems

defining_moments.title: First Robot Competition Victory
defining_moments.description: Leading team to unexpected victory after months of setbacks
defining_moments.emotional_impact: Profound sense of accomplishment and team unity
defining_moments.lessons_learned: Persistence and collaboration can overcome any obstacle

defining_moments.title: From Struggle to Calculus Success
defining_moments.description: During my first year tutoring calculus, I faced a student who struggled despite my efforts. By adapting my teaching methods and focusing on his learning style, I helped him improve significantly, teaching me the value of personalized education.

defining_moments.title: Unexpected Victory at Robotics Championship
defining_moments.description: Our robotics team faced numerous setbacks, including technical failures and team disagreements. By fostering collaboration and perseverance, we turned the tide and achieved an unexpected victory, teaching me that teamwork can overcome any obstacle.

defining_moments.title: Empowering Others Through Mentorship
defining_moments.description: Mentoring new members on the robotics team, I initially struggled to communicate complex concepts effectively. By developing a more empathetic approach, I not only improved their skills but also grew as a mentor, realizing the power of patience and understanding.
